Sunhawk:  Dang him.  I can't risk areal support.  I
must be getting rusty or he'd be a burning pile of
rubble by now.

He turned his sights on Inferno when he reached the
next position keeping his trademark of one (VERY
accurate) shot at the forehead.

--- catmastero <catmastero@...> wrote:
> Being in the air Inferno had a better view of the
> place "It came from 
> somewhere over there!" Inferno said pointing in the
> general direction 
> Sunhawk was in.
> 
> 
> > Realizing his mistake of the second shot he made a
> > semicirle and tried a shot at Nightshades forehead
> > from the same distance, but a different position
> and
> > then started moving again.
> > 
> > --- Jonathan <jhogan@r...> wrote:
> > > He drilled lower just as the laser blast passed
> over
> > > him. He could feel the heat from the beam. He
> pops
> > > out of the hole."Who the hell just shot at me?
> > > DrillBit, TERRORIZE!"He transformes to bot mode,
> his
> > > gattaling gun ready."Did you guys see where that
> > > came from?"
> > > 
> > > {Nightshade}
> > > 
> > >     Nightshade had returned to her beast form
> when
> > > she had completed her report and had sat back
> > > watching as others got their hands dirty doing
> the
> > > digging, when the beam has slide just past
> Drillbits
> > > head her ears perked up, her fox eyes narrowing
> as
> > > she began tracing the beams trajectort back
> towards
> > > it's source, "Give me a nano, tracking..." she
> > > growled as she tensed up ready to spring aside
> if
> > > any shots game her way but she doubted the would
> be

> > > second shot from the same position...
